name: Gas Light
description:
Gaslights is a UnLondon spinoff game in which you are a repairman and have to fix all the gaslights. 

In the process, you learn some information from the conversations of others.

The story after that will continue in future games. 

In-game particle effects can be turned off in OPTION, but your changes will not be saved.

In the game you need to fix a few street lights, just get close to the lights that don't work and press " F ".

After you climb up the gas lamp, press "E" to open the inventory, read the manual and use the tools in the correct order, and finally "F" to repair.
